data.title: Hours + Location
data.meta_description: Discover the magic of Rainforest Cafe at Disney Springs in Lake Buena Vista, FL. Check out our new gluten-free menu. View hours
data.text: *All food items are cooked to the recommended FDA Food Code temperatures, unless otherwise requested. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellÔ¨Åsh or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. For our guests with food allergies or other health-related dietary restrictions, we are happy to discuss and attempt to accommodate your special dietary needs. A suggested gratuity of 18% will be added to checks for parties of 6 or more. Please feel free to increase or decrease the suggested gratuity amount based on your dining experience.
